statements: DELETE FROM ChatbotDialogueHistories WHERE user_id = 'c7e07d70-0a99-4841-98de-0129011c64c9' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM chatbot_dialogues WHERE dialogue_id = 100 AND user_id = 500;
DELETE FROM chatbot_users WHERE username = 'test_user' AND first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM dialogues WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 101;
DELETE FROM bots WHERE bot_id = 3 AND id = 5;
DELETE FROM dialogues WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND agent_id = '08b20580-6e87-45db-bbca-5b57b7365e97';
DELETE FROM conversations WHERE start_time < '2021-01-01' AND agent_id = '333e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM bot_responses WHERE user_id = 3 AND response = 'Thank you';
